name: skull-bash
caption: Skull Bash

effect.short: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Raises the user's [Defense]{mechanic:defense} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage}.  User then charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by []{move:sleep-talk}.

flavorText:
The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense
stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the
next turn.
